# .github/prompts

## Purpose

Reusable prompt templates for common workflows (scan, validate, integrate, etc.).

## Guidelines

- Prefer parameterized prompts with placeholders.
- Avoid embedding repo secrets or credentials.

## Placeholders (adjust per repo)

- Prompt style guide: `{{PROMPT_STYLE_GUIDE}}`
